name: fashion-app-frontend

scripts.build:designer: npm run switch:designer && npm run build
scripts.build:ai: npm run switch:ai && npm run build
scripts.netlify:build: npm run ensure-ui && npm run build
scripts.git:add-core: git add package.json src/App.jsx public/ *.config.js netlify.toml .gitignore
scripts.git:add-shared: git add src/services/ src/contexts/ src/utils/ src/hooks/ src/components/Common/ src/components/Vendor/
scripts.git:add-all-shared: npm run git:add-core && npm run git:add-shared && npm run git:add-docs

description: ## Overview React-based frontend for the Fashion Shopping Platform MVP, covering: - Shopper flows (Auth, Search, Cart/Checkout, Order Tracking) - Vendor flows (Vendor Onboarding, Inventory Management) - Admin flows (User Management, Revenue Reporting)
